entity.name: Fincept Corporation
entity.description: Fincept Corporation develops the Fincept Terminal, a state-of-the-art open-source financial intelligence platform with CFA-level analytics, AI automation, and unlimited data connectivity. We build professional-grade financial tools that compete on analytics depth and data accessibility.

projects.name: Fincept Terminal
projects.description: Cross-platform financial intelligence terminal built with Tauri, React, and Rust. Features complete CFA Level 1-3 analytics, 20+ AI investor personas, 100+ data connectors, visual workflow automation, 3D maritime tracking, and geopolitical intelligence frameworks. A professional alternative to Bloomberg Terminal, built for analysts who refuse to be limited by traditional software.

channels.description: GitHub Sponsors for one-time or recurring donations

plans.name: One-time Grant/Donation
plans.description: Support the development of Fincept Terminal with a one-time contribution to fund feature development, infrastructure, and maintenance.

plans.name: Monthly Sponsorship
plans.description: Recurring monthly support to sustain ongoing development, bug fixes, documentation, and community support.

plans.name: Development Grant
plans.description: Grants to fund specific development initiatives: advanced AI agents, additional data connectors, mobile applications, institutional features, and infrastructure scaling.
